snippet: A political storm unleashed by the swift expulsion of a dissident Kazakh oligarch’s wife and daughter has further strained the already tense relations within three-month-old coalition government.
abstract: Political storm unleashed by whirlwind expulsion of dissident Kazakh oligarch Mukhtar Ablyazov's wife and young daughter further strains relations within Italy's fragile coalition  government; Kazakhstan had issued extradition request for Ablyazov, who is outspoken critic of country's president, and some see Italy's action as attempt to curry favor with gas-rich trading partner.
lead_paragraph: A political storm unleashed by the swift expulsion of a dissident Kazakh oligarch’s wife and daughter has further strained the already tense relations within three-month-old coalition government.

headline.main: Deportation of Kazakhs Frays Italy’s Government
headline.print_headline: Deportation of Kazakhs Frays Italy’s Government
